players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Looks like Alice was taken out last night. We should focus on finding who the detective is before they get us."
Charlie: "Diana, I know you're the mafioso. I investigated you last night. The town should vote to arrest you now before you kill again."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
